elevatorsimulation.participants.impl
Class LevelImpl

java.lang.Object
  elevatorsimulation.participants.impl.LevelImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Level
public class LevelImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Level

This class is used to implement the interface Level. A level has 2 buttons to request an elevator, upButton if a person wishes to go to a destination at a higher floor downButton if a person wishes to go to a destination at a lower floor A level also has a floor Number, which represents its position in the building. It also has a list of people waiting in the level for an elevator.

Author:
vijay

LevelImpl

public LevelImpl(java.lang.Integer floorNumber)
Constructor for LevelImpl class Sets the floor number of the level. Creates a set to store people waiting in the floor. Set the floor buttons to false

Parameters:
floorNumber - the position of the floor in the building
